column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I arrived around 5 pm
column2: and the line was already out the door. The host said a table for one would be 50 minutes
column3: so I took my chance and sat at the bar to avoid the wait time. I recommend you try to find a seat at the bar if you're dining solo or with 2. Once seated
column4: it took 40 minutes for my small Chicago classic to arrive. They suggest you preorder with the cashier to avoid the long wait
